title.label:
light text, and xy center,
enable overlay

text.body:
The Vabeen’PLUM is designed with a 12ml ultra-large capacity tank to provide more vaping enjoyment than similar products. Every drop of e-liquid maximizes its value. Approx. 3500puffs per pod, which can last a week, free you from frequently filling.The translucent tank allows you to clearly observe the capacity of e - liquid.

*individual user experience may vary, depending on usage
